Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLTabItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ifc.app.ECTabItem
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLTabItem
public class SLTabItem
extends ECTabItem
Subclass of ECTabItem that applies the stone-texture look. This is used by SLTabView.
See Also:
SLTabView

SLTabItem()

drawBackground(Graphics, Rect)
Overridden to draw stone-look bezel inside tab bounding rect.
drawStringInRect(Graphics, String, Font, Color, Rect, boolean)
Overridden to draw highlight on lower-right of text, to make it look embedded.
